LanguageData.RGK_bedSingle.label: bed
LanguageData.RGK_bedSingle.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.
LanguageData.RGK_bedSingleB.label: bed
LanguageData.RGK_bedSingleB.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.
LanguageData.RGK_bedDouble.label: double bed
LanguageData.RGK_bedDouble.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.
LanguageData.RGK_bedDoubleB.label: double bed2
LanguageData.RGK_bedDoubleB.description: A Celtic double-wide bed that fits two people.
LanguageData.GL_ClassyDoubleBed.label: classy double bed
LanguageData.GL_ClassyDoubleBed.description: Elegant bed decorated with lace that fits two people. It is very comfortable and doesn't get disturbed during sleep.
LanguageData.RGK_Dresser.label: dresser
LanguageData.RGK_Dresser.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable.label: end table
LanguageData.RGK_EndTable.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RGK_EndTableWithLamp.label: end table
LanguageData.RGK_EndTableWithLamp.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RGK_EndTableWithLampE.label: end table
LanguageData.RGK_EndTableWithLampE.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect. Works as electricity
LanguageData.RGK_bucketr.label: bucket
LanguageData.RGK_orc.label: oak barrel
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleChair.label: simple chair
LanguageData.RGK_SimpleChair.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.RGK_Chair.label: chair
LanguageData.RGK_Chair.description: A comfortable chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.RGKDiningChair.label: dining chair
LanguageData.RGKDiningChair.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.GL_Bench.label: bench
LanguageData.GL_Bench.description: It's a park bench chair. Couples can't sit here.
LanguageData.RGK_TableA.label: table (2x2)
LanguageData.RGK_TableA.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_TableC.label: table (2x2)
LanguageData.RGK_TableC.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_TableB.label: classic table (2x2)
LanguageData.RGK_TableB.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_TableD.label: classic table (2x2)
LanguageData.RGK_TableD.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_TableE.label: classic table (2x1)
LanguageData.RGK_TableE.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_TableF.label: classic table (3x2)
LanguageData.RGK_TableF.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_TableG.label: classic table (2x2)
LanguageData.RGK_TableG.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_TableH.label: classic table (3x3)
LanguageData.RGK_TableH.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_MiniTableA.label: mini table
LanguageData.RGK_MiniTableA.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RGK_MiniTableB.label: Mini table
LanguageData.RGK_MiniTableB.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RKGWineRackB.label: wine rack
LanguageData.RKGWineRackB.description: A shelf that stores wine or alcohol.
LanguageData.WardrobeA.label: wardrobe
LanguageData.WardrobeA.description: Shelves and drawers for storing clothes.
LanguageData.WardrobeB.label: wardrobe
LanguageData.WardrobeB.description: Shelves and drawers for storing clothes.
LanguageData.GL_Bookshelf.label: bookshelf
LanguageData.GL_Bookshelf.description: Increases research speed when placed near research table. Each research bench can use two bookshelf.
LanguageData.GL_Cupboard.label: cupboard
LanguageData.GL_Cupboard.description: A shelf for Tableware. Increases Cook speed when placed near fueled stove table.
LanguageData.GL_TablewareShelf.label: tableware shelf
LanguageData.GL_TablewareShelf.description: A shelf for Tableware. Increases Cook speed when placed near fueled stove table.
LanguageData.RGK_Manger.label: manger
LanguageData.RGK_Manger.description: It's a cask for animals. You can store food and hay.
LanguageData.GL_Shelf.label: shelf
LanguageData.GL_Shelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.RGK_DogBowl.label: bowl
LanguageData.RGK_DogBowl.description: It's a cask for animals. You can store food and hay.
LanguageData.GL_Locker.label: locker
LanguageData.GL_Locker.description: A locker for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. Also it prevents the contents from being damaged by fire.
LanguageData.RGK_Flower.label: replica flower
LanguageData.RGK_Flower.description: It's a flowerpot replica. It'll be in bloom forever.
LanguageData.RGK_Flower_Blueprint.label: replica flower (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Flower_Blueprint_Install.label: replica flower (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Flower_Frame.label: replica flower (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Flower_Frame.description: It's a flowerpot replica. It'll be in bloom forever.
LanguageData.RGK_Teaset.label: tea set
LanguageData.RGK_Teaset.description: This is a set of decorative teas. It looks like a luxury, and it's a shame to use it.
LanguageData.RGK_Teaset_Blueprint.label: tea set (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Teaset_Blueprint_Install.label: tea set (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_Teaset_Frame.label: tea set (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Teaset_Frame.description: This is a set of decorative teas. It looks like a luxury, and it's a shame to use it.
LanguageData.GL_Teddy.label: teddy bear
LanguageData.GL_Teddy.description: It is a fluffy teddy bear.
LanguageData.GL_Teddy_Blueprint.label: teddy bear (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_Teddy_Blueprint_Install.label: teddy bear (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_Teddy_Frame.label: teddy bear (building)
LanguageData.GL_Teddy_Frame.description: It is a fluffy teddy bear.
